<NEW>

WHEELIE quietly murmured, "Prison ship and Grim=
lock..  I don't know what went off half cocked..  But all I think of that I=
 can say..  Is if they're true we can but pray.  For if done by our own sid=
e..  Can things be made worse than taken out of Grimlock's hide?  For to ha=
ve fought for so long..  Then locked up and forced to pay a penance when he=
 did no wrong."

He had heard the rumors, on different ends, of how many of=
 the Autobot veterans had quietly faded away at the end of the war.  OR eve=
n worse, how mysteriously many of the higher ranking Autobots had been casu=
alties in teh chaos after it.

To this day, despite his endless memorials a=
nd nearly Primus-beaific state..

No one could say what had been the fate o=
f Optimus Prime.
